I'm still taking questions this afternoon. Any topic is fair game. Tweet me and use #AskRSC #sctweets #sc05 #tcot
.@tzbauknight  And..here comes the blasphemy... CHENEY WAS WRONG.  The debt is THE problem #askrsc #sctweets
.@tzbauknight You bet that keeps me up at night. #askrsc #sctweets
.@tzbauknight You mean, because we know the threat the debt poses, and how clueless the Dems are about it?   #askrsc #sctweets
@jeffduncan OK, here's my question...aren't you in a meeting with Her Excellency?
@CharlieBeyer RAISING tax rates drives growth?  Taxing something = less of something (smoking, carbon). Same for wealth #askrsc #sctweets
@CharlieBeyer And Obama has no plan for growth.   0.3% increase in GDP over 10 years raises more $ than his tax hikes #askrsc #sctweets
@CharlieBeyer The current tax rates generated record revenues in mid 2000s.  Growth is what drives revs, not tax rates. #askrsc #sctweets
.@mostrolenk Not perfect, but a good start.  We need 2 look at all spending if we are going to tackle our deficits #askrsc #sctweets
.@mostrolenk  Pretty much everybody from RSC on this chat voted in favor of my one-year defense budget freeze amendment #askrsc #sctweets
.@CharlieBeyer. Govt revenues went UP when Reagan cut taxes, and again when Bush did the same. But SPENDING went up faster #askrsc #sctweets
. @classnic_swint That is what our government did. Using trillions and hundreds of billions makes it 2 hard 2 understand #askrsc #sctweets
. @classnic_swint Imagine a family made $46k last year but spent $78k. And the balance on its VISA bill is roughly $322k #askrsc #sctweets
. @classnic_swint Sorry slow to get back. here is breakdown on relating govt debt 2 family budget... #askrsc #sctweets
